title: SIH 2025 Drone-Based Disaster Management
description: Edge-AI system with real-time perception and hardware-software integration for disaster response. Finalist at Smart India Hackathon 2025.

title: PyQubit
description: Open-source Python quantum computing library published on PyPI with 500+ downloads. Simplifies quantum algorithm development and simulation.

title: NightOwls
description: Low-light computer vision system for enhanced image processing and object detection in challenging lighting conditions.

title: Goal-Based Self-Driving Car Prototype
description: Autonomous vehicle prototype with goal-oriented navigation and real-time decision making using computer vision.

title: Custom Knowledge LLM (Tony Stark Edition)
description: Fine-tuned language model with custom knowledge base and personality. Demonstrates LLM customization and deployment.

title: Neuronote
description: AI-powered Chrome extension for intelligent note-taking and content summarization using machine learning.
